sourcesContent: import * as Styled from './styles' export const HighLightMovie = ({ item })=>{ const date = new Date(item.first_air_date) return( {item.original_name} {item.vote_average} pontos {date.getFullYear()} {item.number_of_seasons} Temporada{item.number_of_seasons !== 1 ? 's' : ''} {item.overview} Gêneros: ... ) }
